name: Memorial Day Best BBQ Chicken Ever!
author: Bradley B.
summary: This recipe is everything off the shelf, nothing too fancy, but wonderful and perfect for grilling. Marinate, or add sauce directly to the chicken. Send the kids to do the dishes and enjoy the evening!
directions: In a large bowl, blend the Worcestershire sauce, Cajun seasoning, garlic powder, brown sugar, and ketchup
Place the chicken in the bowl, and coat thoroughly with the sauce mixture
Cover, and refrigerate 8 hours or overnight
Heat an outdoor grill for medium heat, and lightly oil grate
Discard the marinade, and grill chicken 6 to 8 minutes per side on the prepared grill, or until no longer pink and juices run clear
